name: Smart Contact Manager
about: A Smart Contact Manager developed using Spring Boot, MySQL, and Thymeleaf, designed to efficiently manage and organize contact information. It offers features for adding, updating, and deleting contacts with an intuitive user interface.

name: MVC CRUD App
about: MVC CRUD App built using JDBC, Servlets, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, allowing users to perform Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations. It connects to a MySQL database and utilizes MySQL Connector and HikariCP for connection pooling, deployed locally on a Tomcat server.

name: Exam Portal
about: The Exam Portal is a web application developed using Spring Boot, MySQL, and Angular, designed to automate the process of creating, managing, and grading exams. It gives a user-friendly interface for administrators, instructors, and students, enhancing efficiency, accessibility, and security in the examination process.
